Title: MASSIVE LIVE EVENTS
Content: Join us at one of our viewing parties, collegiate tourneys, or social gaming in-houses! You can check in with our calendar here to find out when the next event is happening.
Quote: "Wow, this stadium is so big. - Jordan "Subtact" Kinard

Title: A WELCOMING COMMUNITY
Content: Mentors, mentees, we're all here to have as much fun as possible and help each other with both in video games and out. Read more about us here.
Quote: "Maybe you should go back to Jayce." - Tyson "Fleche" Van

Title: SWAGALICIOUS GIVEAWAYS
Content: We have FREE swag and merch giveaways pretty often. Join our Discord server to learn more!
Quote: "So we can have more than 3 of these cups?" - Jason "Radastorm2" Yang
